english_example_sentence: The brave police quickly caught the dangerous thief and neutralized him.
russian_example_sentence: Храбрый полицейский быстро поймал опасного вора и обезвредил его.
turkish_example_sentence: Cesur polis, tehlikeli hırsızı hızla yakalayarak etkisiz hale getirdi.
